text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Order, where the codes are contained in Results Laboratory Observation - IPS
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Both, where the codes are contained in Results Laboratory Observation - IPS

name: LabOrderCodesEuVs
title: Laboratory Order [LOINC]
description: Laboratory order codes for use in HL7 Europe.
